title: Zarah Sultana – 2021 Statement Following Death of HRH The Duke of Edinburgh
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Zarah Sultana, the Labour MP for Coventry South, on 9 April 2021.
content:
Condolences to the Windsor family on the loss of their husband, father and grandfather Philip – and thoughts with everyone whose life he touched.
